'''Nightmare Fragments''' is an event-exclusive enemy encountered during the {{Quest|As Though Caught in a Dream}} and the {{Quest|As Though Surrounded by Thunder}}. During the first encounter, its name is displayed as '''???'''. 

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|hp_ratio  = 7
|hp_type   = 2
|atk_ratio = 3.6
|atk_type  = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = 5.4 Event Enemy

|name_1 = Leaping Strike
|desc_1 = Jump towards the player's location and perform a downwards strike, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. Then, summons two phantoms that each performs a leaping strike as well, each dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_2 = Iai: Stormbreath
|desc_2 = Summons 3 phantoms and performs a spin attack along with them, each dealing '''66.6% ATK ×2''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|file_2 = 5.4 Event Enemy Iai Stormbreath

|name_3 = Blade Waves
|desc_3 = Swings their blade up to 5 times, launching waves at the player, each dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. Perfect Parrying these waves will deflect them to deal DMG to the Nightmare Fragments instead and interrupt the attack.
|file_3_2 = 5.4 Event Enemy Blade Waves 2
|caption_3_2 = Parried

|name_4 = Three Point Slash
|desc_4 = Blinks to a different location and performs a slash, launching a wave at the player, dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. Repeated 3 times in succession. Perfect Parrying these waves will deflect them to deal DMG to the Nightmare Fragments instead and interrupt the attack.
|file_4_2 = 5.4 Event Enemy Three Point Slash 2
|caption_4_2 = Parried

|name_5 = Downward Cleave
|desc_5 = Infuses its blade and performs a downward cleave, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. This attack is considered a power attack and can be perfect parried. If the player does not land a perfect parry counterattack, consecutively summons 3 additional phantoms at the player's location. Each phantom performs up to 2 slashes, with each slash dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|file_5_2 = 5.4 Event Enemy Downward Cleave 2
|caption_5_2 = Parried

|name_6 = Impaling Nightmares
|desc_6 = Second encounter only. After reaching '''~75%''' of its Max HP, holds up its fist to taunt the player and disappears, then summons many phantoms in succession, each marking a path on the ground targeting the player and charging through, dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|file_6 = 5.4 Event Enemy Impaling Nightmares
|file_6_2 = 5.4 Event Enemy Impaling Nightmares 2

|name_7 = Defensive Stance
|desc_7 = Second encounter only. After reaching '''~25%''' of its Max HP, holds up its blade to block all incoming attacks. After some time, [[Ei (Quest Boss)|Ei]] will assist the player in breaking its defense.
|file_7_2 = 5.4 Event Enemy Defensive Stance 2
|caption_7_2 = Ei's Assist
}}
